name: Defend Or Die (Game barrier)
description:
This game was made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam

Controls

Keyboard and mouse or gamepad

How to play

Buy turrets from the shop,

The turrets have an asigned dice, the number at the top of the dice indicates wich enemies it can attack, so a tower with number 2 on top of the tower can only attack enemies with number 2 on top, but you can reroll the number on your tower

The further the game progresses the more number possibilities enemies can have, beware of the special enemy types


Defend or Die is a tower defence game where each tower has a corresponding dice. The number on the dice must match that of the incoming enemies in order to prevent them from reaching the end and leading to your demise!

Buy turrets from the shop with money earned from destroying enemies. Place them carefully as each turret can only target one enemy type! You can try your luck by rerolling the towers so they match the incoming threats, but be quick before it's too late!

This game supports multiple control schemes including xBox, PlayStation and Keyboard & Mouse!

Brought to you by team Game Barrier, we hope you enjoyed.
